current.header--promo-bar--text: FREE DOOR-TO-DOOR SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER R500
current.home-featured-promo-description: The Blockshop theme boasts spacious layouts, block colors, bold typography with a minimal user interface that endures trends with simplicity and style. Content is divided into large customizable blocks giving you the freedom to adjust layout, color, typography and UI elements to represent your brand with boldness and clarity. Retina-ready and completely responsive the Blockshop is your one stop shop.
current.home-featured-promo-video: <iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/27243869?color=ffffff" width="800" height="450" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
current.supported_currencies: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
